Package com.gsm.service

Interface ZaloService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZaloServiceImpl
    public interface ZaloService
    Defines the contract for services related to the Zalo Mini App integration. This includes user authentication, account linking, and handling production output data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ZaloSaleOrderInfoDto findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
      Finds all distinct style and color combinations for a given Sale Order number.
      UserDto linkAccount​(ZaloLinkRequestDto linkRequest)
      Links a Zalo account to an existing system (GSM) user account.
      UserDto loginByZaloId​(java.lang.String zaloUserId)
      Authenticates a user via their Zalo User ID.
      void saveProductionOutputs​(java.util.List<ProductionOutputDto> outputDtos)
      Saves a batch of production output records submitted from the Zalo Mini App.

    • Method Detail

      • loginByZaloId

        UserDto loginByZaloId​(java.lang.String zaloUserId)
        Authenticates a user via their Zalo User ID. This is used when a user opens the Mini App and is already linked.
        Parameters:
        zaloUserId - The unique identifier provided by Zalo for the user.
        Returns:
        A UserDto containing essential user information if the link is found.

      • linkAccount

        UserDto linkAccount​(ZaloLinkRequestDto linkRequest)
        Links a Zalo account to an existing system (GSM) user account. Requires the user's system credentials for verification.
        Parameters:
        linkRequest - A DTO containing the Zalo User ID, system username, and password.
        Returns:
        A UserDto of the user whose account has been successfully linked.

      • findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo

        ZaloSaleOrderInfoDto findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        Finds all distinct style and color combinations for a given Sale Order number. This is used to populate selection dropdowns in the Zalo Mini App.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The business number of the Sale Order.
        Returns:
        A DTO containing the Sale Order's internal ID and a list of its styles/colors.

      • saveProductionOutputs

        void saveProductionOutputs​(java.util.List<ProductionOutputDto> outputDtos)
        Saves a batch of production output records submitted from the Zalo Mini App.
        Parameters:
        outputDtos - A list of DTOs, each representing a single production output entry.
